name: Curved Shot
desc: (Basic Attack) Fires a [Curved Shot] which deals 85% Physical DMG.

name: Foot Sniping
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 110% DMG and inflicts [{-}Move II] for 2 turns.

name: Straight Shot
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% Physical DMG.

name: Armor-piercing Shot
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 150% DMG to 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range around the character. Before attacking, gains [Shield Break II].

name: Insightful Bash
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 120% DMG. Before attacking, dispels 2 [buffs] on the target and inflicts [Vulnerable I] for 1 turn.

name: Tearing Whirlwind
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 90% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within 1 tile around the character and inflicts [{x}Healing Received] on them, lasting 2 turns.

name: Dual Blade Strike
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 50% physical DMG 2 times.

name: Shadow Gait
desc: (Support) [Instant] Teleports behind the enemy and steals 1 random [Attribute Buff] from the target.

name: Burning Bridges
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG. Before attacking, gains [Offensive Stance] for 2 turns.

name: Slash
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% Physical DMG.

name: Rupture Armor
desc: (Passive) Before a single-target attack, gains a 50% chance to inflict [{-}P.DEF II] on the target for 2 turns.

name: Intimidate
desc: (Passive) At the end of the turn, inflicts [{-}ATK II] on the enemy with the highest P.ATK within a 4-tile radius around the character for 2 turns.

name: Survival Desire
desc: (Passive) When [Dying], increases Movement by 2 tiles.

name: Weak Spot Protection
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%, and the chance of taking critical hits is decreased by 30%.

name: Weapon Eroder
desc: (Piercing DMG) Single-target attack. Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 30% of thetarget's HP and theninflicts [{-}ATK II] for 2 turns.

name: Thorny Armor
desc: (Passive) Upon receiving Physical Attacks, deals [Piercing DMG] to the attacker equal to 50% of the character's P.DEF.

name: Scatter
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 70% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 3x3 area in the target direction and inflicts [{-}MoveI], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Luxite Shrapnel
desc: (Piercing DMG) Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% of the target's HP to all enemies within 2 tiles around the target and inflicts 3 stacks of [Infection].

name: Vantage Point
desc: (Passive) Increases ATK by 10% when attacking from the [Highland].

name: Weakening Attack
desc: (Passive) After attacking, gains a 50% chance to inflict [{-}ATK II] on the target, lasting 2 turns.

name: Weak Spot Protection
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%, and the chance of taking critical hits is decreased by 30%.

name: Curse
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. Upon receiving an active attack, inflicts [Vulnerable II] on the attacker for 2 turns.

name: Penetrating Arrow
desc: (Passive) After attacking, inflicts [{-}P.DEF II] on the target for 3 turns.

name: Place Trap
desc: (Support) After placing a [Beast Trap], the character can move again by 2 tiles and inherit the remaining Movement.

name: Armor Eroder
desc: (Piercing DMG) Single-target attack. Deals (Piercing DMG] equal to 30% of the target's HP and then inflicts [{-}P.DEF II] and [{-}M.DEF II] for 2 turns.

name: Knock-Back Shot
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 135% DMG to 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range around the character and knocks them back by 2 tiles.

name: Perfect Shield
desc: (Passive) When [Unharmed], increases ATK and DEF by 10%.

name: Melee Archer
desc: (Passive) [Basic Attack] can target enemies adjacent tothe character. When attacking enemies adjacent to the character, ATK is increased by 15%.

name: Weak Spot Protection
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%, and the chance of taking critical hits is decreased by 30%.

name: Counterattack
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack from the [front or side], performs a basic attack to [Strike Back] if the attacker is within range, dealing 70% of basic attack's DMG. The effect can be activated up to 1 time per round.

name: Infected Arrowhead
desc: (Passive) After a [basic attack], inflicts 2 stacks of [Infection] on the target.

name: Intuition
desc: (Passive) Takes 20% less [ranged DMG].

name: Crippling Bash
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 115% DMG and inflicts [{-}ATK II] and [{-}Move II] for 2 turns.

name: Risky Move
desc: (Passive) P.ATK increases by 20% but P.DEF and M.DEF are decreased by 15%.

name: Weakening Attack
desc: (Passive) After attacking, gains a 50% chance to inflict [{-}ATK II] on the target, lasting 2 turns.

name: Dominate
desc: (Passive) When attacking, if the character's HP Percentage is higher than the target's, the character's ATK is increased by 12%.

name: Curse
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. Upon receiving an active attack, inflicts [Vulnerable II] on the attacker for 2 turns.

name: Counterattack
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack from the [front or side], performs a basic attack to [Strike Back] if the attacker is within range, dealing 70% of basic attack's DMG. The effect can be activated up to 1 time per round.

name: Knockback Bash
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 140% DMG and knocks the target back by 2 tiles.

name: Powerful Throw
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG.

name: Mania Smash
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 120% DMG. After attacking, gains 1.0% [Life Steal].

name: Sweeping Bash
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 80% DMG to all enemies within a 3x2 area in the target direction and inflicts [{-}P.DEF I], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Shield Break
desc: (Passive) Increases ATK by 15% when attacking enemies with a [shield].

name: Warm-Up
desc: (Passive) When on [Standby], gains [{+}Move I] and [Climb] for 1 turn.

name: Defense (Back Attack)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. When hit by a [back attack], DMG taken is additionally decreased by 30%.

name: Defense (Physical)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active Physical Attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 15%.

name: Powerful Throw
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG.

name: Weakening Attack
desc: (Passive) After attacking, gains a 50% chance to inflict [{-}ATK II] on the target, lasting 2 turns.

name: Backstab
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG. Before attacking, if the character performs a [back attack], inflicts [{x}Reaction Skills] onthe target for 1 turn.

name: Luxite Shrapnel
desc: (Piercing DMG) Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% of the target's HP to all enemies within 2 tiles around the target and inflicts 3 stacks of [Infection].

name: Offensive Assault
desc: (Passive) Increases ATK by 8% when attacking.

name: Terminate
desc: (Passive) When attacking [Dying] enemies, increases ATK by 25%.

name: Defense (Magical)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active Magical Attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 15%.

name: Weak Spot Protection
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%, and the chance of taking critical hits is decreased by 30%.

name: Shapeless Blade
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG. If the character performs a [back attack], ignores [Assisting Cover].

name: Emergency Dodge
desc: (Passive) At the end of the turn, if the characteris [Injured], gains [Dodge] for 2 turns. CD: 3 turns.

name: Knockback Combo
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 30% DMG. Then, performs [Pursuit] and deals DMG equal to 200% of the character's P.DEF, up to 150% of P.ATK. Knocks the target back by 2 tiles.

name: Rage
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. After being attacked, the character gains [{+}DMG II] for 3 turns.

name: Shield of Raid
desc: Gains [Block]. When taking physical DMG for the first time from [front or side] enemies, gains a 100% chance to trigger [block], after which the character deals 15% more DMG.

name: Restraining Shot
desc: Increases P.ATK by 15%. Whenever the character deals DMG, there is a 70% chance to inflict 1 random (Level 2 Attribute Debuff] on the target for 2 turns.

name: Target Weakness
desc: Deals 35% more DMG when attacking an enemy with a [debuff].

name: Spear of Fragility
desc: When attacking an [Injured] enemy, increases P.ATK by 30%.

name: Axe of Boldness
desc: Increases [AoE DMG] by 35%.

name: Raiding Strike
desc: Gains [Jump]. When attacking an [Injured] enemy, increases Crit by 20%.
